pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy – Winholm Social Casino 18+ winholm Home Why are we About Us +46-651-71-11-01 Privacy Policy Winholm ("us", "we", or "our") operates the Winholm social casino, a simulator of gambling games (the "Service"). This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data when you use our Service and the choices you have associated with that data. We use your data to provide and improve the service.Using the service, you agree to collect and use information in accordance with this policy.If otherwise confidentiality is not determined in this policy, the terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our use conditions available on Winholm. Collecting and using information we collect various types of information for various purposes to provide you with the best service. Types of Data Collected Personal Data While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you ("Personal Data"). Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to: Email address First name and last name Cookies and Usage Data We can also collect data on use that your browser sends every time you visit our service or when you get access to the service through a mobile device ("Data on Use"). This information about the use may include data such as the IP address of your computer (for example, IP address), a browser type, a browser version, the pages of our service that you visit, the date and time of your visit, the time spent on these pages,Unique device identifiers and other diagnostic information. When you get access to the service through a mobile device, this information can include data such as the type of mobile device you use, a unique identifier of your mobile device, the IP address of your mobile device, the operating system of your mobile device, the type of mobile Internet browserthat you use, unique devices identifiers and other diagnostic information. Tracking & Cookies Data We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our Service and hold certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data that may include anonymous unique identifier.Cookies are sent to your browser from the site and stored on your device.Tracking technologies such as beacons, tags and scripts are also used to collect and track information and improve and analyze our service. You can indicate to your browser to abandon all cookies or show when the cookie is sent.However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some parts of our service.
